title: Someone Else's Shoes
author: Jojo Moyes
description: Nisha Cantor lives the globetrotting life of the seriously wealthy, until her husband announces a divorce and cuts her off.

title: Shadow of Light
author: Moly Lee
description: I just saved the boy I’m falling for from a gruesome death by a demon. And what does he have to say? I’m the key to opening the gates of Hell. I mean, a thank-you would’ve been nice. Or another scorching-hot, forbidden kiss. Either way, destiny will have to find someone else to torment, because I’m so done.

title: The Lovely Bones
author: Alice Sebold
description: It is the story of a teenage girl who, after being raped and murdered, watches from her personal Heaven as her family and friends struggle to move on with their lives while she comes to terms with her own death.
